greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = determinant(P*Q)/n! where P, Q are n X n matrices with P[i,j]=lcm(i,j), Q[i,j]=gcd(i,j).
link: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
results.author: MCKAY john (mckay(AT)cs.concordia.ca), Mar 21 2001
